ComicInfo.Summary:
BOOK THIRTY-FIVE: THE MAXIMUM SECRET
Nothing you could possibly imagine is about to occur in the pages of this comic book! Multiply your expectations by a thousand, and you still wouldn’t come close! As the end draws near, Commander Adam Archer and company are forced to confront everything they ever believed in… But what sacrifices will they make to ensure the evolutionary process?
GØDLAND PUTS YOUR BRAIN BETWEEN A ROCK AND A HARD PLACE!
Notes:
The cover is a homage to the Vitruvian Man.
ComicInfo.Title: The Maximum Secret
